description: A Dart widget class defining a reusable card container with a title and body content for Flutter UI.

classes.name: CardContainer
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a card with a title and a child widget as content.

methods.name: CardContainer
methods.description: Constructor for CardContainer, requires a title and a child widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the CardContainer, including the card, padding, column, text, and child content.
